segments.source_content: # Upgrading to Docusaurus v3

translations.zh-CN: # 升级至 Docusaurus v3

segments.source_content: This documentation will help you upgrade your site from Docusaurus v2 to Docusaurus v3.

translations.zh-CN: 本文档将指导您将站点从 Docusaurus v2 升级至 Docusaurus v3。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 is a new **major version**, including **breaking changes** requiring you to adjust your site accordingly. We will guide to during this process, and also mention a few optional recommendations.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 是一个**主版本更新**，包含需要您相应调整站点的**破坏性变更**。我们将在此过程中提供指引，并给出一些可选建议。

segments.source_content: This is not a full rewrite, and the breaking changes are relatively easy to handle. The simplest sites will eventually upgrade by simply updating their npm dependencies.

translations.zh-CN: 这并非完全重写，且破坏性变更相对容易处理。最简单的站点仅需更新 npm 依赖即可完成升级。

segments.source_content: The main breaking change is the upgrade from MDX v1 to MDX v3. Read the [**MDX v2**](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v2/) and [**MDX v3**](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/) release notes for details. MDX will now compile your Markdown content **more strictly** and with **subtle differences**.

translations.zh-CN: 主要破坏性变更是从 MDX v1 升级至 MDX v3。请阅读 [**MDX v2**](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v2/) 和 [**MDX v3**](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/) 的发布说明以获取详情。MDX 现在会以**更严格的标准**和**细微差异**编译您的 Markdown 内容。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Before upgrading]

Before upgrading, we recommend [**preparing your site for Docusaurus v3**](/blog/preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3). There are changes that you can already **handle incrementally, under Docusaurus v2**. Doing so will help reduce the work needed to finally upgrade to Docusaurus v3.

For complex sites, we also recommend to set up [**visual regression tests**](/blog/upgrading-frontend-dependencies-with-confidence-using-visual-regression-testing), a good way to ensure your site stays visually identical. Docusaurus v3 mainly upgrades dependencies, and is not expected to produce any visual changes.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[升级前准备]

在升级前，我们建议先[**为 Docusaurus v3 准备您的站点**](/blog/preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3)。有些变更您可以在**Docusaurus v2 环境下逐步处理**。这样做能减少最终升级至 Docusaurus v3 所需的工作量。

对于复杂站点，我们还建议设置[**视觉回归测试**](/blog/upgrading-frontend-dependencies-with-confidence-using-visual-regression-testing)，这是确保站点视觉表现一致的有效方法。Docusaurus v3 主要升级依赖项，预计不会产生视觉变化。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note

Check the release notes for [**Docusaurus v3.0.0**](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/releases/tag/v3.0.0), and browse the pull-requests for additional useful information and the motivation behind each change mentioned here.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

请查阅 [**Docusaurus v3.0.0**](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/releases/tag/v3.0.0) 的发布说明，并通过浏览相关 pull-requests 获取更多有用信息及本文提及变更的背景动机。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Upgrading Dependencies

translations.zh-CN: ## 升级依赖项

segments.source_content: Upgrading to Docusaurus v3 requires upgrading core Docusaurus dependencies (`@docusaurus/name`), but also other related packages.

translations.zh-CN: 升级至 Docusaurus v3 需要更新核心 Docusaurus 依赖 (`@docusaurus/name`) 以及其他相关包。

segments.source_content: ## Upgrading MDX

translations.zh-CN: ## 升级 MDX

segments.source_content: MDX is a major dependency of Docusaurus responsible for compiling your `.md` and `.mdx` files to React components.

translations.zh-CN: MDX 是 Docusaurus 的核心依赖项，负责将您的 `.md` 和 `.mdx` 文件编译为 React 组件。

segments.source_content: The transition from MDX v1 to MDX v3 is the **main challenge** to the adoption of Docusaurus v3. Most breaking changes come from MDX v2, and MDX v3 is a relatively small release.

translations.zh-CN: 从 MDX v1 过渡到 MDX v3 是采用 Docusaurus v3 的**主要挑战**。大部分破坏性变更来自 MDX v2，而 MDX v3 是一个相对较小的版本。

segments.source_content: Some documents that compiled successfully under Docusaurus v2 might now **fail to compile** under Docusaurus v3.

translations.zh-CN: 某些在 Docusaurus v2 下能成功编译的文档，现在可能在 Docusaurus v3 下**编译失败**。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Find problematic content ahead of time]

Run [`npx docusaurus-mdx-checker`](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-mdx-checker) on your site to get a list of files that will now fail to compile under Docusaurus v3.

This command is also a good way to estimate the amount of work to be done to make your content compatible. Remember most of this work can be executed ahead of the upgrade by [preparing your content for Docusaurus v3](/blog/preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[提前发现潜在问题内容]

在您的站点上运行 [`npx docusaurus-mdx-checker`](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-mdx-checker) 以获取在 Docusaurus v3 下会编译失败的文件列表。

此命令也是评估兼容性改造工作量的好方法。请注意大部分工作可以通过[为 Docusaurus v3 准备内容](/blog/preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3)提前完成。

:::

segments.source_content: Other documents might also **render differently**.

translations.zh-CN: 其他文档也可能**呈现不同效果**。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Use visual regression tests]

For large sites where a manual review of all pages is complicated, we recommend you to setup [visual regression tests](https://docusaurus.io/blog/upgrading-frontend-dependencies-with-confidence-using-visual-regression-testing).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[使用可视化回归测试]

对于大型站点而言，手动检查所有页面会非常繁琐，我们建议您设置[可视化回归测试](https://docusaurus.io/blog/upgrading-frontend-dependencies-with-confidence-using-visual-regression-testing)。

:::

segments.source_content: Upgrading MDX comes with all the breaking changes documented on the [MDX v2](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v2/) and [MDX v3](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/) release blog posts. Most breaking changes come from MDX v2, and MDX v3 is a relatively small release. The [MDX v2 migration guide](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/) has a section on how to [update MDX files](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/#update-mdx-files) that will be particularly relevant to us. Also make sure to read the [Troubleshooting MDX](https://mdxjs.com/docs/troubleshooting-mdx/) page that can help you interpret common MDX error messages.

translations.zh-CN: 升级MDX会带来[MDX v2](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v2/)和[MDX v3](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/)发布博客中记录的所有破坏性变更。大多数破坏性变更来自MDX v2，而MDX v3是一个相对较小的版本。[MDX v2迁移指南](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/)中有一个关于[如何更新MDX文件](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/#update-mdx-files)的部分，这对我们特别有用。同时请务必阅读[MDX故障排除](https://mdxjs.com/docs/troubleshooting-mdx/)页面，它可以帮助您理解常见的MDX错误信息。

segments.source_content: Make sure to also read our updated [**MDX and React**](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx) documentation page.

translations.zh-CN: 请确保同时阅读我们更新的[**MDX与React**](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx)文档页面。

segments.source_content: ### Using the MDX playground

translations.zh-CN: ### 使用MDX Playground

segments.source_content: The MDX playground is your new best friend. It permits to understand how your content is **compiled to React components**, and troubleshoot compilation or rendering issues in isolation.

translations.zh-CN: MDX Playground是您的新朋友。它可以帮助您理解您的内容是如何**被编译为React组件**的，并隔离地解决编译或渲染问题。

segments.source_content:
- [MDX playground - current version](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)
- [MDX playground - v1](https://mdx-git-renovate-babel-monorepo-mdx.vercel.app/playground/)

translations.zh-CN:
- [MDX Playground - 当前版本](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)
- [MDX Playground - v1](https://mdx-git-renovate-babel-monorepo-mdx.vercel.app/playground/)

segments.source_content:
<details>
  <summary>Configuring the MDX playground options for Docusaurus</summary>

To obtain a compilation behavior similar to what Docusaurus v2 uses, please turn on these options on the [MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/):

- Use `MDX`
- Use `remark-gfm`
- Use `remark-directive`

![Screenshot of the MDX playground's options panel, with only the "Use `MDX`", "Use `remark-gfm`", and "Use `remark-directive`" options checked](@site/blog/2023/09-29-preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3/img/mdx2-playground-options.png)

</details>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b1edb09b

segments.source_content: Using the two MDX playgrounds side-by-side, you will soon notice that some content is compiled differently or fails to compile in v2.

translations.zh-CN: 同时使用两个MDX Playground，您很快就会发现某些内容在v2中的编译方式不同或无法编译。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Making your content future-proof]

The goal will be to refactor your problematic content so that it **works fine with both versions of MDX**. This way, when you upgrade to Docusaurus v3, this content will already work out-of-the-box.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[使您的内容面向未来]

目标将是重构您的问题内容，使其**在两个版本的MDX中都能正常工作**。这样，当您升级到Docusaurus v3时，这些内容已经可以开箱即用。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Using the MDX checker CLI

translations.zh-CN: ### 使用MDX检查器CLI

segments.source_content: We provide a [docusaurus-mdx-checker](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-mdx-checker) CLI that permits to easily spot problematic content. Run this command on your site to obtain a list of files that will fail to compile under MDX v3.

translations.zh-CN: 我们提供了一个[docusaurus-mdx-checker](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-mdx-checker) CLI，可以轻松发现有问题内容。在您的站点上运行此命令，以获取在MDX v3下无法编译的文件列表。

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx docusaurus-mdx-checker
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b5ea89c4

segments.source_content: For each compilation issue, the CLI will log the file path and a line number to look at.

translations.zh-CN: 对于每个编译问题，CLI将记录文件路径和需要查看的行号。

segments.source_content: ![Screenshot of the terminal showing an example MDX checker CLI output, with a few error messages](@site/blog/2023/09-29-preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3/img/mdx-checker-output.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![终端截图，显示MDX检查器CLI输出的示例，包含一些错误信息](@site/blog/2023/09-29-preparing-your-site-for-docusaurus-v3/img/mdx-checker-output.png)

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use this CLI to estimate of how much work will be required to make your content compatible with MDX v3.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

使用此CLI来估算使您的内容与MDX v3兼容需要多少工作量。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This CLI is a best effort, and will **only report compilation errors**.

It will not report subtle compilation changes that do not produce errors but can affect how your content is displayed. To catch these problems, we recommend using [visual regression tests](/blog/upgrading-frontend-dependencies-with-confidence-using-visual-regression-testing).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

此CLI是尽力而为的，**仅报告编译错误**。

它不会报告那些不产生错误但可能影响您内容显示的细微编译变化。为了捕捉这些问题，我们建议使用[可视化回归测试](/blog/upgrading-frontend-dependencies-with-confidence-using-visual-regression-testing)。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Common MDX problems

translations.zh-CN: ### 常见的MDX问题

segments.source_content: Docusaurus cannot document exhaustively all the changes coming with MDX. That's the responsibility of the [MDX v2](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/) and [MDX v3](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v3/) migration guides.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus无法详尽记录MDX带来的所有变更。这是[MDX v2](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v2/)和[MDX v3](https://mdxjs.com/migrating/v3/)迁移指南的责任。

segments.source_content: However, by upgrading a few Docusaurus sites, we noticed that most of the issues come down to only a few cases that we have documented for you.

translations.zh-CN: 然而，通过升级几个Docusaurus站点，我们注意到大多数问题归结为少数几种情况，我们已经为您记录了这些情况。

segments.source_content: #### Bad usage of `{`
The `{` character is used for opening [JavaScript expressions](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#expressions). MDX will now fail if what you put inside `{expression}` is not a valid expression.

translations.zh-CN: `{`字符用于打开[JavaScript表达式](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#expressions)。如果放在`{expression}`中的内容不是有效表达式，MDX现在会失败。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ec2ce541

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Error message]

> Could not parse expression with acorn: Unexpected content after expression

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[错误信息]

> 无法用 acorn 解析表达式：表达式后出现意外内容

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[How to upgrade]

Available options to fix this error:

- Use inline code: `{username: string, age: number}`
- Use the HTML code: `{`
- Escape it: `\{`

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[升级方案]

可选的修复方案：

- 使用行内代码：`{username: string, age: number}`
- 使用 HTML 实体编码：`{`
- 使用转义符：`\{`

:::

segments.source_content: #### Bad usage of `<`

translations.zh-CN: #### 错误使用 `<` 符号

segments.source_content: The `<` character is used for opening [JSX tags](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#jsx). MDX will now fail if it thinks your JSX is invalid.

translations.zh-CN: `<` 符号用于开启 [JSX 标签](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#jsx)。如果 MDX 认为你的 JSX 无效，解析将会失败。

segments.source_content:
```md title="example.md"
Use Android version <5

You can use a generic type like Array<T>

Follow the template "Road to <YOUR_MINOR_VERSION>"
```

:::danger[Error messages]

> Unexpected character `5` (U+0035) before name, expected a character that can start a name, such as a letter, `$`, or `_`

> Expected a closing tag for `<T>` (1:6-1:9) before the end of `paragraph` end-tag-mismatch mdast-util-mdx-jsx

> Expected a closing tag for `<YOUR_MINOR_VERSION>` (134:19-134:39) before the end of `paragraph`

:::

translations.zh-CN:

> 在名称前出现意外字符 `5` (U+0035)，期望是能作为名称起始的字符（如字母、`$` 或 `_`）

> 在段落结束标签前期望出现 `</T>` 的闭合标签 (1:6-1:9)，标签不匹配

> 在段落结束前期望出现 `</YOUR_MINOR_VERSION>` 的闭合标签 (134:19-134:39)

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[How to upgrade]

Available options to fix this error:

- Use inline code: `Array<T>`
- Use the HTML code: `<` or `<`
- Escape it: `\<`

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[升级方案]

可选的修复方案：

- 使用行内代码：`Array<T>`
- 使用 HTML 实体编码：`<` 或 `<`
- 使用转义符：`\<`

:::

segments.source_content: #### Bad usage of GFM Autolink

translations.zh-CN: #### 错误使用 GFM 自动链接

segments.source_content: Docusaurus supports [GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM)](https://github.github.com/gfm/), but [autolink](https://github.github.com/gfm/#autolinks) using the `<link>` syntax is not supported anymore by MDX.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 支持 [GitHub 风味 Markdown (GFM)](https://github.github.com/gfm/)，但 MDX 不再支持使用 `<link>` 语法的[自动链接](https://github.github.com/gfm/#autolinks)。

segments.source_content:
```md title="example.md"
<sebastien@thisweekinreact.com>

<http://localhost:3000>
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3e53354a

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Error messages]

> Unexpected character `@` (U+0040) in name, expected a name character such as letters, digits, `$`, or `_`; whitespace before attributes; or the end of the tag (note: to create a link in MDX, use `[text](url)`)

> Unexpected character `/` (U+002F) before local name, expected a character that can start a name, such as a letter, `$`, or `_` (note: to create a link in MDX, use `[text](url)`)

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[错误信息示例]

> 名称中出现意外字符 `@` (U+0040)，期望是名称字符（如字母、数字、`$` 或 `_`）、属性前的空白或标签结束符（注意：在 MDX 中创建链接请使用 `[文本](网址)`）

> 在本地名称前出现意外字符 `/` (U+002F)，期望是能作为名称起始的字符（如字母、`$` 或 `_`）（注意：在 MDX 中创建链接请使用 `[文本](网址)`）

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[How to upgrade]

Use regular Markdown links, or remove the `<` and `>`. MDX and GFM are able to autolink literals already.

{/* prettier-ignore */}
```md title="example.md"
sebastien@thisweekinreact.com
[sebastien@thisweekinreact.com](mailto:sebastien@thisweekinreact.com)

http://localhost:3000
[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[升级方案]

使用标准 Markdown 链接语法，或移除 `<` 和 `>` 符号。MDX 和 GFM 已能自动识别纯文本链接。

{/* prettier-ignore */}
```md title="示例.md"
sebastien@thisweekinreact.com
[sebastien@thisweekinreact.com](mailto:sebastien@thisweekinreact.com)

http://localhost:3000
[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)
```

:::

segments.source_content: #### Lower-case MDXComponent mapping

translations.zh-CN: #### 小写 MDXComponent 映射问题

segments.source_content: For users providing a [custom `MDXComponent`mapping](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx#mdx-component-scope), components are now "sandboxed":

translations.zh-CN: 对于自定义 [`MDXComponent` 映射](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx#mdx-component-scope)的用户，组件现在处于"沙盒"环境中：

segments.source_content:
- a `MDXComponent` mapping for `h1` only gets used for `# hi` but not for `

hi

` - a **lower-cased** custom element name will not be substituted by its respective `MDXComponent` component anymore

translations.zh-CN:
- `h1` 的 `MDXComponent` 映射仅适用于 `# 标题` 语法，不适用于 `

标题

` - **小写**的自定义元素名称将不再被对应的 `MDXComponent` 组件替换

segments.source_content:
:::danger[visual difference]

Your [`MDXComponent` component mapping](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx#mdx-component-scope) might not be applied as before, and your custom components might no longer be used.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[显示差异]

你的 [MDXComponent 组件映射](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx#mdx-component-scope)可能不再像之前那样生效，自定义组件可能不再被使用。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Unintended extra paragraphs

translations.zh-CN: #### 意外产生的额外段落

segments.source_content:
In MDX v3, it is now possible to interleave JSX and Markdown more easily without requiring extra line breaks. Writing content on multiple lines can also produce new expected `

` tags.

translations.zh-CN:
在 MDX v3 中，现在可以更轻松地混合使用 JSX 和 Markdown，而无需额外的换行符。在多行编写内容也可能产生预期之外的新 `

` 标签。

segments.source_content:

segments.source_content: #### Unintended usage of directives

translations.zh-CN: #### 指令的意外使用

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 now uses [Markdown Directives](https://talk.commonmark.org/t/generic-directives-plugins-syntax/444) (implemented with [remark-directive](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-directive)) as a generic way to provide support for admonitions, and other upcoming Docusaurus features.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 现在使用 [Markdown 指令](https://talk.commonmark.org/t/generic-directives-plugins-syntax/444)（通过 [remark-directive](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-directive) 实现）作为通用方式支持 admonitions 和其他即将推出的 Docusaurus 功能。

segments.source_content:
```md title="example.md"
This is a :textDirective

::leafDirective

:::containerDirective

Container directive content

:::
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_d14a389e

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Visual change]

Directives are parsed with the purpose of being handled by other Remark plugins. Unhandled directives will be ignored, and won't be rendered back in their original form.

```md title="example.md"
The AWS re:Invent conf is great
```

Due to `:Invent` being parsed as a text directive, this will now be rendered as:

```
The AWS re
conf is great
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[视觉变化]

指令会被解析并由其他 Remark 插件处理。未处理的指令将被忽略，不会以原始形式渲染。

```md title="example.md"
The AWS re:Invent conf is great
```

由于 `:Invent` 被解析为文本指令，现在会渲染为：

```
The AWS re
conf is great
```

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[How to upgrade]

- Use the HTML code: `:`
- Add a space after `:` (if it makes sense): `: text`
- Escape it: `\:`

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[如何升级]

- 使用 HTML 编码：`:`
- 在 `:` 后添加空格（如果适用）：`: text`
- 使用转义符：`\:`

:::

translations.zh-CN: #### 不再支持缩进式代码块

The upgrade does not generally produce new MDX compilation errors, but can lead to content being rendered in an unexpected way because there isn't a code block anymore.

:::

升级通常不会产生新的 MDX 编译错误，但可能导致内容以意外方式渲染，因为不再有代码块。

:::

:::

使用常规代码块语法替代缩进：

segments.source_content: ### Other Markdown incompatibilities

translations.zh-CN: ### 其他 Markdown 不兼容性

segments.source_content: #### Emphasis starting or ending with a space or a punctuation

translations.zh-CN: #### 以空格或标点符号开头/结尾的强调

segments.source_content: New MDX parser now strictly complies with the CommonMark spec. CommonMark spec has introduced rules for emphasis around spaces and punctuation, which are incompatible especially with languages that do not use a space to split words, since v0.14.

translations.zh-CN: 新版 MDX 解析器严格遵循 CommonMark 规范。自 v0.14 起，CommonMark 规范引入了关于强调与空格和标点符号的规则，这对不使用空格分隔单词的语言尤其不兼容。

segments.source_content: Japanese and Chinese are most affected by this, but there are some other languages that can be affected (e.g. Thai and Khmer), for example when you try to emphasize an inline code or a link. Languages that use a space to split words are much less affected.

translations.zh-CN: 日语和中文受此影响最大，但其他一些语言也可能受到影响（如泰语和高棉语），例如当您尝试强调内联代码或链接时。使用空格分隔单词的语言受影响程度要小得多。

segments.source_content: `**` (other than `` `**` ``) in the following example were parsed as intended in Docusaurus 2, but are not now in Docusaurus 3.

translations.zh-CN: 以下示例中的 `**`（除了 `` `**` ``）在 Docusaurus 2 中按预期解析，但在 Docusaurus 3 中不再如此。

segments.source_content:
```md title="example.md"
**Do not end a range of emphasis with a space. **Or `**` will not work as intended.

<!-- Japanese -->
**「。」の後に文を続けると`**`が意図した動作をしません。**また、**[リンク](https://docusaurus.io/)**や**`コード`**のすぐ外側に`**`、そのさらに外側に句読点以外がある場合も同様です。
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1bf0c626

segments.source_content: See the detailed conditions and how to upgrade If `*` or `**` matches either of the following conditions, it will not work as the beginning of an emphasis mark anymore: - The next character is a space (e.g. `word* word`) - The previous character is a punctuation character and the next character is a letter (not a space or punctuation character) (e.g. `文**（文）`) On the contrary, if `*` or `**` matches either of the following conditions, it will not work as the end of an emphasis mark anymore: - The previous character is a space (e.g. `word *word`) - The next character is a punctuation character and the previous character is a letter (e.g. `文。**文`) “A punctuation character” includes non-ASCII ones, brackets, quotation marks and some symbols including `%` and `@`. More strictly speaking, a character whose 2-letters Unicode category starts with `P` is treated as a punctuation character here. :::tip[How to upgrade] If the offending emphasis mark is next to a space, move the space out of the range of emphasis: ```md title="english.md" **Do not end a range of emphasis with a space.** Or `**` will not work. ``` If the offending emphasis mark is surrounded by both a punctuation character and a letter, you can fix it without modifying the content by: 1. Convert the document to MDX if it is a vanilla Markdown. 2. replace the offending emphasis mark with a raw HTML tag (`` or ``) instead: {/* prettier-ignore */} ```mdx title="japanese.mdx" 「。」の後に文を続けると`**`が意図した動作をしません。また、[リンク](https://docusaurus.io/)や`コード`のすぐ外側に`**`、そのさらに外側に句読点以外がある場合も同様です。 ``` While not an ideal solution, you can also either of the following without converting the document to MDX: - Move the most outside punctuation character out of the emphasis mark. {/* prettier-ignore */} ```md title="japanese.md" **「。」の後に文を続けると`**`が意図した動作をしません**。また、[**リンク**](https://docusaurus.io/)や・・・ ``` - Put a space just outside of the offending `*` or `**`. This solution does not force you to convert the document to MDX. {/* prettier-ignore */} ```md title="japanese.md" **「。」の後に文を続けると`**`が意図した動作をしません。** また、**[リンク](https://docusaurus.io/)** や **`コード`** のすぐ外側に`**`、そのさらに外側に句読点以外がある場合も同様です。 ``` :::

segments.source_content: ### MDX plugins

translations.zh-CN: ### MDX 插件

segments.source_content: All the official packages (Unified, Remark, Rehype...) in the MDX ecosystem are now [**ES Modules only**](https://gist.github.com/sindresorhus/a39789f98801d908bbc7ff3ecc99d99c) and do not support [CommonJS](https://nodejs.org/api/modules.html#modules-commonjs-modules) anymore.

translations.zh-CN: MDX 生态系统中所有官方包（Unified、Remark、Rehype 等）现在都[**仅支持 ES 模块**](https://gist.github.com/sindresorhus/a39789f98801d908bbc7ff3ecc99d99c)，不再支持 [CommonJS](https://nodejs.org/api/modules.html#modules-commonjs-modules)。

segments.source_content: In practice this means that you can't do `require("remark-plugin")` anymore.

translations.zh-CN: 这意味着您不能再使用 `require("remark-plugin")`。

segments.source_content:
:::info[For plugin authors]

If you created custom Remark or Rehype plugins, you may need to refactor those, or eventually rewrite them completely, due to how the new AST is structured. We have created a [dedicated support discussion](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9337) to help plugin authors upgrade their code.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[插件开发者须知]

如果您创建了自定义的 Remark 或 Rehype 插件，可能需要重构这些插件，甚至完全重写，因为新的 AST 结构发生了变化。我们创建了一个[专门的支持讨论](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9337)来帮助插件开发者升级代码。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Formatters

translations.zh-CN: ### 格式化工具

segments.source_content: Prettier, the most common formatter, supports only the legacy MDX v1, not v3 yet as of Docusaurus v3.0.0. You can add `{/* prettier-ignore */}` before the incompatible parts of your code to make it work with Prettier.

translations.zh-CN: 最常用的格式化工具 Prettier 目前仅支持旧版 MDX v1，截至 Docusaurus v3.0.0 尚未支持 v3。您可以在代码的不兼容部分前添加 `{/* prettier-ignore */}` 以使其与 Prettier 兼容。

segments.source_content:
```mdx
{/* prettier-ignore */}
<SomeComponent>Some long text in the component</SomeComponent>
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_7e0e84c0

segments.source_content: If you get tired of too many `{/* prettier-ignore */}` insertions, you can consider disabling MDX formatting by Prettier by adding the following to your `.prettierignore` file, until it starts supporting MDX v3:

translations.zh-CN: 如果 `{/* prettier-ignore */}` 插入过多让您感到繁琐，可以考虑在 Prettier 开始支持 MDX v3 之前，通过将以下内容添加到 `.prettierignore` 文件来禁用 Prettier 对 MDX 的格式化：

segments.source_content:
```txt title=".prettierignore"
*.mdx
```

segments.source_content: ## Other Breaking Changes

translations.zh-CN: ## 其他重大变更

segments.source_content: Apart the MDX v3 upgrade, here is an exhaustive list of breaking changes coming with Docusaurus v3.

translations.zh-CN: 除了 MDX v3 升级外，以下是 Docusaurus v3 带来的完整重大变更列表。

segments.source_content: ### Node.js v18.0

translations.zh-CN: ### Node.js v18.0

segments.source_content: Node.js 16 [reached End-of-Life](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/announcements/nodejs16-eol), and Docusaurus v3 now requires **Node.js >= 18.0**.

translations.zh-CN: Node.js 16 [已终止支持](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/announcements/nodejs16-eol)，Docusaurus v3 现在要求 **Node.js >= 18.0**。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[How to upgrade]

Install Node.js 18.0+ on your computer.

Eventually, configure your continuous integration, CDN or host to use this new Node.js version.

You can also update your site `package.json` to prevent usage of an older unsupported version:

```diff title="package.json"
 {
   "engines": {
-     "node": ">=16.14"
+     "node": ">=18.0"
   }
 }
```

Upgrade your Docusaurus v2 site to Node.js 18 before upgrading to Docusaurus v3.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[升级指南]

在您的计算机上安装 Node.js 18.0+。

同时，配置您的持续集成、CDN 或主机以使用这个新的 Node.js 版本。

您还可以更新站点的 `package.json` 以防止使用不再支持的旧版本：

```diff title="package.json"
 {
   "engines": {
-     "node": ">=16.14"
+     "node": ">=18.0"
   }
 }
```

在升级到 Docusaurus v3 之前，先将您的 Docusaurus v2 站点升级到 Node.js 18。

:::

segments.source_content: ### React v18.0+

translations.zh-CN: ### React v18.0+

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 now requires **React >= 18.0**.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 现在要求 **React >= 18.0**。

segments.source_content: React 18 comes with its own breaking changes that should be relatively easy to handle, depending on the amount of custom React code you created for your site. The official themes and plugins are compatible with React 18.

translations.zh-CN: React 18 自带了一些破坏性变更，根据您为站点编写的自定义 React 代码量，这些变更可能相对容易处理。官方主题和插件均已兼容 React 18。

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

Read the official [React v18.0](https://react.dev/blog/2022/03/29/react-v18) and [How to Upgrade to React 18](https://react.dev/blog/2022/03/08/react-18-upgrade-guide), and look at your own React code to figure out which components might be affected this upgrade.

We recommend to particularly look for:

- Automatic batching for stateful components
- New React hydration errors reported to the console

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

阅读官方 [React v18.0](https://react.dev/blog/2022/03/29/react-v18) 和 [如何升级到 React 18](https://react.dev/blog/2022/03/08/react-18-upgrade-guide)，并检查您自己的 React 代码以确定哪些组件可能受此升级影响。

我们建议特别关注：

- 有状态组件的自动批处理
- 控制台报告的 React 水合新错误

:::

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Experimental support for React 18 features]

React 18 comes with new features:

- `<Suspense>`
- `React.lazy()`
- `startTransition`

Their Docusaurus support is considered as experimental. We might have to adjust the integration in the future, leading to a different runtime behavior.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[React 18 新特性的实验性支持]

React 18 引入了新特性：

- `<Suspense>`
- `React.lazy()`
- `startTransition`

Docusaurus 对这些特性的支持尚处于实验阶段。未来我们可能需要调整集成方式，导致运行时行为发生变化。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Prism-React-Renderer v2.0+

translations.zh-CN: ### Prism-React-Renderer v2.0+

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 upgrades [`prism-react-renderer`](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer) to v2.0+. This library is used for code block syntax highlighting.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 将 [`prism-react-renderer`](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/prism-react-renderer) 升级至 v2.0+。该库用于代码块的语法高亮。

segments.source_content: ### React-Live v4.0+

translations.zh-CN: ### React-Live v4.0+

segments.source_content: For users of the `@docusaurus/theme-live-codeblock` package, Docusaurus v3 upgrades [`react-live`](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-live) to v4.0+.

translations.zh-CN: 对于使用 `@docusaurus/theme-live-codeblock` 包的用户，Docusaurus v3 将 [`react-live`](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-live) 升级至 v4.0+。

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

In theory, you have nothing to do, and your existing interactive code blocks should keep working as before.

However, this is a new major library version containing breaking changes, and we can't guarantee a strict retro-compatibility. Read the [v3](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-live/releases/tag/v3.0.0) and [v4](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-live/releases/tag/v4.0.0) changelogs in case of problems.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

理论上您无需任何操作，现有交互式代码块应能继续正常工作。

但这是包含破坏性变更的新主版本，我们无法保证严格的向后兼容性。如遇问题请查阅 [v3](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-live/releases/tag/v3.0.0) 和 [v4](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/react-live/releases/tag/v4.0.0) 的变更日志。

:::

segments.source_content: ### remark-emoji v4.0+

translations.zh-CN: ### remark-emoji v4.0+

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 upgrades [`remark-emoji`](https://github.com/rhysd/remark-emoji) to v4.0+. This library is to support `:emoji:` shortcuts in Markdown.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 将 [`remark-emoji`](https://github.com/rhysd/remark-emoji) 升级至 v4.0+。该库用于支持 Markdown 中的 `:emoji:` 快捷语法。

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

Most Docusaurus users have nothing to do. Users of emoji shortcodes should read the [changelog](https://github.com/rhysd/remark-emoji/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) and double-check their emojis keep rendering as expected.

> **Breaking Change** Update [node-emoji](https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-emoji) from v1 to v2. This change introduces support for many new emojis and removes old emoji short codes which are no longer valid on GitHub.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

大多数 Docusaurus 用户无需任何操作。使用表情符号短代码的用户应查阅 [更新日志](https://github.com/rhysd/remark-emoji/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)，并确认表情符号渲染效果是否符合预期。

> **重大变更** 将 [node-emoji](https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-emoji) 从 v1 升级至 v2。此变更新增了大量新表情符号支持，同时移除了 GitHub 已失效的旧表情符号短代码。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Mermaid v10.4+

translations.zh-CN: ### Mermaid v10.4+

segments.source_content: For users of the `@docusaurus/theme-mermaid` package, Docusaurus v3 upgrades [`mermaid`](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid) to v10.4+.

translations.zh-CN: 对于使用 `@docusaurus/theme-mermaid` 包的用户，Docusaurus v3 将 [`mermaid`](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid) 升级至 v10.4+。

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

In theory, you have nothing to do, and your existing diagrams should keep working as before.

However, this is a new major library version containing breaking changes, and we can't guarantee a strict retro-compatibility. Read the [v10](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid/releases/tag/v10.0.0) changelog in case of problem.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

理论上您无需任何操作，现有图表应能继续正常工作。

但请注意这是包含破坏性变更的主版本升级，我们无法保证完全向后兼容。若遇到问题请查阅 [v10 更新日志](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid/releases/tag/v10.0.0)。

:::

segments.source_content: ### TypeScript v5.1+

translations.zh-CN: ### TypeScript v5.1+

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 now requires **TypeScript >= 5.1**.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 现在要求 **TypeScript >= 5.1**。

segments.source_content: ### TypeScript base config

translations.zh-CN: ### TypeScript 基础配置

segments.source_content: The official Docusaurus TypeScript config has been re-internalized from the external package [`@tsconfig/docusaurus`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tsconfig/docusaurus) to our new monorepo package [`@docusaurus/tsconfig`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/tsconfig).

translations.zh-CN: 官方 Docusaurus TypeScript 配置已从外部包 [`@tsconfig/docusaurus`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tsconfig/docusaurus) 迁移至我们新的 monorepo 包 [`@docusaurus/tsconfig`](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@docusaurus/tsconfig)。

segments.source_content: This new package is versioned alongside all the other Docusaurus core packages, and will be used to ensure TypeScript retro-compatibility and breaking changes on major version upgrades.

translations.zh-CN: 该新包将与所有其他 Docusaurus 核心包保持同步版本，用于确保 TypeScript 的向后兼容性和主版本升级时的破坏性变更管理。

segments.source_content: ### New Config Loader

translations.zh-CN: ### 新配置加载器

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 changes its internal config loading library from [`import-fresh`](https://github.com/sindresorhus/import-fresh) to [`jiti`](https://github.com/unjs/jiti). It is responsible for loading files such as `docusaurus.config.js` or `sidebars.js`, and Docusaurus plugins.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 将其内部配置加载库从 [`import-fresh`](https://github.com/sindresorhus/import-fresh) 更换为 [`jiti`](https://github.com/unjs/jiti)。该组件负责加载诸如 `docusaurus.config.js`、`sidebars.js` 等文件以及 Docusaurus 插件。

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

In theory, you have nothing to do, and your existing config files should keep working as before.

However, this is a major dependency swap and subtle behavior changes could occur.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

理论上您无需任何操作，现有配置文件应能继续正常工作。

但请注意这是核心依赖的重大变更，可能会引发细微的行为变化。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Admonition Warning

translations.zh-CN: ### 警告提示框变更

segments.source_content: For historical reasons, we support an undocumented admonition `:::warning` that renders with a red color.

translations.zh-CN: 由于历史原因，我们曾支持未文档化的红色 `:::warning` 提示框。

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Warning]

This is a Docusaurus v2 `:::warning` admonition.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[警告]

这是 Docusaurus v2 的 `:::warning` 提示框。

:::

segments.source_content: However, the color and icon have always been wrong. Docusaurus v3 re-introduces `:::warning` admonition officially, documents it, and fix the color and icon.

translations.zh-CN: 但其颜色和图标始终存在错误。Docusaurus v3 正式重新引入 `:::warning` 提示框，完善其文档，并修正了颜色与图标。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This is a Docusaurus v3 `:::warning` admonition.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

这是 Docusaurus v3 的 `:::warning` 警示框。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

If you previously used the undocumented `:::warning` admonition, make sure to verify for each usage if yellow is now an appropriate color. If you want to keep the red color, use `:::danger` instead.

Docusaurus v3 also [deprecated the `:::caution`](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9308) admonition. Please refactor `:::caution` (yellow) to either `:::warning` (yellow) or `:::danger` (red).

If you want to keep the title “caution”, you might want to refactor it to `:::warning[caution]` (yellow).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

若您曾使用未文档化的 `:::warning` 警示框，请逐一检查黄色是否仍适用。如需保留红色警示，请改用 `:::danger`。

Docusaurus v3 已[弃用 `:::caution`](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9308) 警示框。请将 `:::caution`（黄色）重构为 `:::warning`（黄色）或 `:::danger`（红色）。

如需保留"caution"标题，可重构为 `:::warning[caution]`（黄色）。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Versioned Sidebars

translations.zh-CN: ### 版本化侧边栏

segments.source_content: This breaking change will only affect **Docusaurus v2 early adopters** who versioned their docs before `v2.0.0-beta.10` (December 2021).

translations.zh-CN: 此破坏性变更仅影响 **2021年12月前** 在 `v2.0.0-beta.10` 之前启用文档版本化的**早期 Docusaurus v2 用户**。

segments.source_content: When creating version `v1.0.0`, the sidebar file contained a prefix `version-v1.0.0/` that [Docusaurus v3 does not support anymore](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9310).

translations.zh-CN: 创建 `v1.0.0` 版本时，侧边栏文件包含 `version-v1.0.0/` 前缀，[Docusaurus v3 已不再支持此语法](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9310)。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b52780dd

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

Remove the useless versioned prefix from your versioned sidebars.

```json title="versioned_sidebars/version-v1.0.0-sidebars.json"
{
  "docs": ["introduction", "prerequisites"]
}
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

从版本化侧边栏中移除冗余前缀：

```json title="versioned_sidebars/version-v1.0.0-sidebars.json"
{
  "docs": ["introduction", "prerequisites"]
}
```

:::

segments.source_content: ### Blog Feed Limit

translations.zh-CN: ### 博客订阅限制

segments.source_content: The `@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog` now limits the RSS feed to the last 20 entries by default. For large Docusaurus blogs, this is a more sensible default value to avoid an increasingly large RSS file.

translations.zh-CN: `@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog` 现在默认将 RSS 订阅限制为最近20篇文章。对于大型博客站点，此默认值可避免订阅文件无限膨胀。

segments.source_content: ### Docs Theme Refactoring

translations.zh-CN: ### 文档主题重构

segments.source_content: For users that swizzled docs-related theme components (like `@theme/DocPage`), these components have been significantly refactor to make it easier to customize.

translations.zh-CN: 对于自定义过文档主题组件（如 `@theme/DocPage`）的用户，这些组件已进行重大重构以提升可定制性。

segments.source_content: Technically, **this is not a breaking change** because these components are **flagged as unsafe to swizzle**, however many Docusaurus sites ejected docs-related components, and will be interested to know their customizations might break Docusaurus.

translations.zh-CN: 严格来说**这并非破坏性变更**，因为这些组件原本就**标记为不安全定制**。但许多站点仍进行了深度定制，需注意原有修改可能失效。

segments.source_content:
:::info[How to upgrade]

Delete all your swizzled components, re-swizzle them, and re-apply your customizations on top of the newly updated components.

Alternatively, you can look at the [pull-request notes](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7966) to understand the new theme component tree structure, and eventually try to patch your swizzled components manually.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[升级指南]

删除所有自定义组件，重新通过 swizzle 生成，并在新组件基础上重新应用定制。

或参考[PR说明](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/7966)了解新版主题组件树结构，尝试手动迁移现有定制。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Optional Changes

translations.zh-CN: ## 可选变更

segments.source_content: Some changes are not mandatory, but remain useful to be aware of to plainly leverage Docusaurus v3.

translations.zh-CN: 以下变更非强制要求，但了解这些特性可充分发挥 Docusaurus v3 优势。

segments.source_content: ### Automatic JSX runtime

translations.zh-CN: ### 自动 JSX 运行时

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 now uses the React 18 ["automatic" JSX runtime](https://legacy.reactjs.org/blog/2020/09/22/introducing-the-new-jsx-transform.html).

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 现采用 React 18 的[自动 JSX 转换](https://legacy.reactjs.org/blog/2020/09/22/introducing-the-new-jsx-transform.html)。

segments.source_content: It is not needed anymore to import React in JSX files that do not use any React API.

translations.zh-CN: 未使用 React API 的 JSX 文件不再需要显式导入 React。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3095ebb5

segments.source_content: ### ESM and TypeScript Configs

translations.zh-CN: ### ESM 与 TypeScript 配置

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 supports ESM and TypeScript config files, and it might be a good idea to adopt those new options.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 支持 ESM 和 TypeScript 格式的配置文件，建议考虑采用这些新特性。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_83be9aeb
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3de7f0cd

segments.source_content: ### Using the `.mdx` extension

translations.zh-CN: ### 使用 `.mdx` 扩展名

segments.source_content: We recommend using the `.mdx` extension whenever you use JSX, `import`, or `export` (i.e. MDX features) inside a Markdown file. It is semantically more correct and improves compatibility with external tools (IDEs, formatters, linters, etc.).

translations.zh-CN: 我们建议在 Markdown 文件中使用 JSX、`import` 或 `export`（即 MDX 特性）时始终采用 `.mdx` 扩展名。这更符合语义规范，并能提升与外部工具（IDE、格式化工具、代码检查器等）的兼容性。

segments.source_content: In future versions of Docusaurus, `.md` files will be parsed as standard [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/), which does not support these features. In Docusaurus v3, `.md` files keep being compiled as MDX files, but it will be possible to [opt-in for CommonMark](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3018).

translations.zh-CN: 未来版本的 Docusaurus 中，`.md` 文件将作为标准 [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/) 解析，不再支持这些特性。在 Docusaurus v3 中，`.md` 文件仍会被编译为 MDX 文件，但后续将支持 [手动切换至 CommonMark 模式](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3018)。

segments.source_content: ### Upgrading math packages

translations.zh-CN: ### 数学公式包升级

segments.source_content: If you use Docusaurus to render [Math Equations](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-math-equations.mdx), you should upgrade the MDX plugins.

translations.zh-CN: 若使用 Docusaurus 渲染 [数学公式](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-math-equations.mdx)，需更新 MDX 插件。

segments.source_content: Make sure to use `remark-math 6` and `rehype-katex 7` for Docusaurus v3 (using MDX v3). We can't guarantee other versions will work.

translations.zh-CN: 请确保为 Docusaurus v3（使用 MDX v3）安装 `remark-math 6` 和 `rehype-katex 7`，其他版本可能不兼容。

segments.source_content:
```diff package.json
{
-  "remark-math": "^3.0.0",
+  "remark-math": "^6.0.0",
-  "rehype-katex": "^5.0.0"
+  "rehype-katex": "^7.0.0"
}
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a867168b

segments.source_content: ### Turn off MDX v1 compat

translations.zh-CN: ### 关闭 MDX v1 兼容模式

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 comes with [MDX v1 compatibility options](../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown), that are turned on by default.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 默认启用了 [MDX v1 兼容选项](../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown)。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_e75b75be

segments.source_content: #### `comments` option

translations.zh-CN: #### `comments` 选项

segments.source_content: This option allows the usage of HTML comments inside MDX, while HTML comments are officially not supported anymore.

translations.zh-CN: 该选项允许在 MDX 中使用 HTML 注释，而官方标准已不再支持 HTML 注释。

segments.source_content: For MDX files, we recommend to progressively use MDX `{/* comments */}` instead of HTML `<!-- comments -->`, and then turn this compatibility option off.

translations.zh-CN: 对于 MDX 文件，我们建议逐步改用 MDX 的 `{/* 注释 */}` 替代 HTML 的 `<!-- 注释 -->`，然后关闭此兼容选项。

segments.source_content:
:::info[Blog truncate marker]

The default blog truncate marker now supports both `<!-- truncate -->` and `{/* truncate */}`.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info[博客截断标记]

默认的博客截断标记现已同时支持 `<!-- truncate -->` 和 `{/* truncate */}`。

:::

segments.source_content: #### `admonitions` option

translations.zh-CN: #### `admonitions` 选项

segments.source_content: This option allows the usage of the Docusaurus v2 [admonition title](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-admonitions.mdx#specifying-title) syntax:

translations.zh-CN: 该选项支持 Docusaurus v2 的 [警告框标题](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-admonitions.mdx#specifying-title) 语法：

segments.source_content:
```md
:::note Your Title

content

:::
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0181069c

segments.source_content: Docusaurus now implements admonitions with [Markdown Directives](https://talk.commonmark.org/t/generic-directives-plugins-syntax/444) (implemented with [remark-directive](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-directive)), and the syntax to provide a directive label requires square brackets:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 现通过 [Markdown 指令](https://talk.commonmark.org/t/generic-directives-plugins-syntax/444)（基于 [remark-directive](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-directive)）实现警告框，指定指令标签需使用方括号：

segments.source_content:
```md
:::note[Your Title]

content

:::
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_855cb850

segments.source_content: We recommend to progressively use the new Markdown directive label syntax, and then turn this compatibility option off.

translations.zh-CN: 建议逐步采用新的 Markdown 指令标签语法，随后关闭此兼容选项。

segments.source_content: #### `headingIds` option

translations.zh-CN: #### `headingIds` 选项

segments.source_content: This option allows the usage of the Docusaurus v2 [explicit heading id](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-toc.mdx#heading-ids) syntax:

translations.zh-CN: 该选项支持 Docusaurus v2 的 [显式标题 ID](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-toc.mdx#heading-ids) 语法：

segments.source_content: {'### Hello World \u007B#my-explicit-id}\n'}

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ec188cd2

segments.source_content: This syntax is now invalid MDX, and would require to escape the `{` character: `{#my-explicit-id}`.

translations.zh-CN: 此语法在 MDX 中已失效，需转义 `{` 字符：`{#my-explicit-id}`。

segments.source_content: We recommend to keep this compatibility option on for now, until we provide a new syntax compatible with newer versions of MDX.

translations.zh-CN: 建议暂时保持此兼容选项开启，直至我们提供兼容新版 MDX 的新语法。

segments.source_content: ## Troubleshooting

translations.zh-CN: ## 故障排查

segments.source_content: In case of any upgrade problem, the first things to try are:

translations.zh-CN: 若遇升级问题，建议优先尝试：

segments.source_content:
- make sure all your docs compile in the [MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/), or using [`npx docusaurus-mdx-checker`](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-mdx-checker)
- delete `node_modules` and `package-lock.json`, and then run `npm install` again
- run `docusaurus clear` to clear the caches
- remove third-party plugins that might not support Docusaurus v3
- delete all your swizzled components

translations.zh-CN:
- 确保所有文档能在 [MDX 演练场](https://mdxjs.com/playground/) 编译，或使用 [`npx docusaurus-mdx-checker`](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-mdx-checker)
- 删除 `node_modules` 和 `package-lock.json` 后重新运行 `npm install`
- 执行 `docusaurus clear` 清除缓存
- 移除可能不兼容 Docusaurus v3 的第三方插件
- 删除所有 swizzle 过的组件

segments.source_content: Once you have tried that, you can ask for support through the following support channels:

translations.zh-CN: 若问题仍未解决，可通过以下支持渠道寻求帮助：

segments.source_content:
- [Docusaurus v3 - Upgrade Support](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9336)
- [Docusaurus v3 - Discord channel #migration-v2-to-v3](https://discord.com/channels/398180168688074762/1154771869094912090)
- [MDX v3 - Upgrade Support](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9053)
- [MDX v3 - Remark/Rehype Plugins Support](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9337)
- [MDX v3 - Discord channel #migration-mdx-v3](https://discord.com/channels/398180168688074762/1116724556976111616)

translations.zh-CN:
- [Docusaurus v3 - 升级支持](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9336)
- [Docusaurus v3 - Discord频道 #migration-v2-to-v3](https://discord.com/channels/398180168688074762/1154771869094912090)
- [MDX v3 - 升级支持](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9053)
- [MDX v3 - Remark/Rehype插件支持](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9337)
- [MDX v3 - Discord频道 #migration-mdx-v3](https://discord.com/channels/398180168688074762/1116724556976111616)

segments.source_content: Please consider **our time is precious**. To ensure that your support request is not ignored, we kindly ask you to:

translations.zh-CN: 请注意**我们的时间非常宝贵**。为确保您的支持请求不被忽略，我们恳请您：

segments.source_content:
- provide a **minimal** reproduction that we can easily run, ideally created with [docusaurus.new](https://docusaurus.new)
- provide a live deployment url showing the problem in action (if your site can build)
- explain clearly the problem, much more than an ambiguous "it doesn't work"
- include as much relevant material as possible: code snippets, repo url, git branch urls, full stack traces, screenshots and videos
- present your request clearly, concisely, showing us that you have made an effort to help us help you

translations.zh-CN:
- 提供**最小化**可复现案例，建议通过[docusaurus.new](https://docusaurus.new)创建
- 提供展示问题的线上部署链接（如果您的站点能成功构建）
- 清晰描述问题本质，避免模糊表述如"无法运行"
- 包含所有相关材料：代码片段、仓库链接、git分支地址、完整堆栈跟踪、截图及视频
- 以清晰简洁的方式呈现请求，表明您已尽力协助我们解决问题

segments.source_content: Alternatively, you can look for a paid [Docusaurus Service Provider](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9281) to execute this upgrade for you. If your site is open source, you can also ask our community for [free, benevolent help](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9283).

translations.zh-CN: 您也可以选择付费的[Docusaurus服务提供商](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9281)代为升级。若您的项目是开源的，还可以向社区寻求[免费志愿帮助](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/9283)。
